§ Grand Master Jangshah

⸺ by Charles Iliya Krempeaux

Grand Master **Jangshah** is a character from **18**.

§§ World 18

[[world-18]], usually just shorterned to **18**, is an animation influenced by //another animation// that was based on a hundreds-of-years-old story called [[journey-to-the-west]] (西遊記) that featured the character [[son-wu-kong]] (孫悟空), as well as influenced by ancient Egyptian mythology, and Persian mythology.

§§ About

Grand Master **Jangshah** lives in the village of [[seyawt]] on planet [[kemeta]].

Grand Master **Jangshah** is a martial-arts teacher.

Grand Master **Jangshah** is the //maternal grandfather// of [[lupa-varka]].

He is also the //father-in-law// of [[gorg-varka]].

And is the adopted //grandfather// of [[zoon]].

He is the martial-arts teacher of:

• [[lupa-varka]],
• Pomelo,
• //and many others//.
